structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.text: The provisions of KRS 198B.550 to 198B.630 shall apply to the preparation of technical drawings, installation, repair, alteration, extension, maintenance or inspection of fire protection sprinkler systems other statutes notwithstanding.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 383, sec. 17, effective July 13, 1984.
